azurerm_monitor_scheduled_query_rules_al.description: Manages an AlertingAction Scheduled Query Rules resource within Azure Monitor

name.description: The name of the scheduled query rule. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the scheduled query rule instance.

data_source_id.description: The resource URI over which log search query is to be run.

time_window.description: Time window for which data needs to be fetched for query (must be greater than or equal to `frequency`).  Values must be between 5 and 2880 (inclusive).

trigger.description: The condition that results in the alert rule being run.

authorized_resource_ids.description: List of Resource IDs referred into query.

description.description: The description of the scheduled query rule.

enabled.description: Whether this scheduled query rule is enabled.  Default is `true`.

severity.description: Severity of the alert. Possible values include: 0, 1, 2, 3, or 4.

action_group.description: List of action group reference resource IDs.

custom_webhook_payload.description: Custom payload to be sent for all webhook payloads in alerting action.

email_subject.description: Custom subject override for all email ids in Azure action group.

metricColumn.description: Evaluation of metric on a particular column.

threshold.description: Result or count threshold based on which rule should be triggered.  Values must be between 0 and 10000 inclusive.

metricTrigger.description: A `metricTrigger` block as defined above. Trigger condition for metric query rule.

id.description: The ID of the scheduled query rule.

create.description: Used when creating the Scheduled Query Rule Alert.

update.description: Used when updating the Scheduled Query Rule Alert.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Scheduled Query Rule Alert.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Scheduled Query Rule Alert.
